verses.verse: <S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to him <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you want <S%G1410>to,<s%> you can <S%G2511>make<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2511>clean.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> stretched <S%G1614>out<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G2309>want<s%> <S%G2511>to.<s%> Be made clean." <S%G2112>Immediately<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> was <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3708>"See<s%> that you <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G3367>nobody,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5217>go,<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to the <S%G2409>priest,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4374>offer<s%> the <S%G1435>gift<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4367>commanded,<s%> <S%G1519>as<s%> a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> to <S%G846>them.<s%>"
<S%G1525>When<s%> <S%G2424>he<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> a <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3870>asking<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G906>lies<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G1171>paralyzed,<s%> grievously <S%G928>tormented.<s%>"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> will come <S%G2064>and<s%> <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"

The <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1510>I<s%>'m <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> <S%G2443>for<s%> you to <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4721>roof.<s%> <S%G3440>Just<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> will be <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> also a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers.<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G4198>one,<s%> 'Go,' <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4198>goes;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> tell <S%G243>another,<s%> <S%G2064><s%> 'Come,' <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2064>comes;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> tell <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G4160><s%> 'Do <S%G5124>this,<s%>' <S%G2532>and<s%> he does <S%G4160>it.<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2296>it,<s%> he marveled, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to those who <S%G190>followed,<s%> "Most <S%G281>certainly<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2147>I<s%> <S%G3761>haven't<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> so <S%G5118>great<s%> a <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G3761>not<s%> even <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1424>west,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will sit <S%G347>down<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>Heaven,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> will be thrown <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1857>outer<s%> <S%G4655>darkness.<s%> <S%G1563>There<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2805>weeping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G1543>centurion,<s%> "Go your <S%G5217>way.<s%> <S%G5613>Let<s%> it be <S%G1096>done<s%> for <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> have <S%G4100>believed.<s%>" <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> was <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

<S%G2064>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>'s <S%G3614>house,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3994>wife<s%>'s mother <S%G906>lying<s%> sick with a <S%G4445>fever.<s%>

He <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%> She got <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>served<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G3798>evening<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> possessed with <S%G1139>demons.<s%> He cast <S%G1544>out<s%> the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G3056>with<s%> a <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> who <S%G2192>were<s%> <S%G2560>sick;<s%>

<S%G3704>that<s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying:<s%> <S%G846>"He<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G769>infirmities,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G941>bore<s%> our <S%G3554>diseases.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1492>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>around<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he gave the <S%G2753>order<s%> to <S%G565>depart<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the other <S%G4008>side.<s%>

<S%G1520>A<s%> <S%G1122>scribe<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> I will <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3699>wherever<s%> you <S%G565>go.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "The <S%G258>foxes<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5454>holes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky<s%> have <S%G2682>nests,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3756>nowhere<s%> <S%G4226>to<s%> <S%G2827>lay<s%> his <S%G2776>head.<s%>"

<S%G2087>Another<s%> <S%G3101>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2010>allow<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2290>bury<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>father.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G190>"Follow<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G863>leave<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> to <S%G2290>bury<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> own <S%G3498>dead.<s%>"
<S%G1684>When<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1684>got<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>boat,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> a <S%G3173>violent<s%> <S%G4578>storm<s%> <S%G2532>came<s%> <S%G1096>up<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> so much <S%G5620>that<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> was <S%G2572>covered<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> the <S%G2949>waves,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2518>asleep.<s%>

They <S%G2532>came<s%> <S%G4334>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1453>woke<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3004>up,<s%> saying, <S%G4982>"Save<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord!<s%> We are <S%G622>dying!<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are <S%G2075>you<s%> <S%G1169>fearful,<s%> O <S%G2075>you<s%> of little <S%G3640>faith?<s%>" <S%G5119>Then<s%> he got <S%G1453>up,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1055>calm.<s%>

The <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "What kind of <S%G4217>man<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%>"

<S%G2064>When<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the other <S%G4008>side,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5561>country<s%> of the <S%G1086>Gergesenes,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> people possessed by <S%G1139>demons<s%> <S%G5221>met<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1831>there,<s%> coming out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3419>tombs,<s%> <S%G3029>exceedingly<s%> <S%G5467>fierce,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3361>nobody<s%> <S%G2480>could<s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3598>way.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> they cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do <S%G2254>we<s%> have to <S%G2532>do<s%> with <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%> Have you <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> to <S%G928>torment<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time?<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5519>pigs<s%> <S%G1006>feeding<s%> far <S%G3112>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G1142>demons<s%> <S%G3870>begged<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G1544>cast<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1544>out,<s%> <S%G2010>permit<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> to go <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>pigs.<s%>"

He <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go!<s%>" <S%G1161>They<s%> came <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>pigs:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>pigs<s%> <S%G3729>rushed<s%> <S%G2596>down<s%> the <S%G2911>cliff<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5204>water.<s%>

<S%G1161>Those<s%> who fed <S%G1006>them<s%> <S%G5343>fled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went away <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3956>everything,<s%> <S%G2532>including<s%> what <S%G3588>happened<s%> to those who were possessed with <S%G1139>demons.<s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2532>came<s%> <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4877>meet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> When they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they <S%G3870>begged<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> he would <S%G3327>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3725>borders.<s%>
